pages.text: Summe yevmel kıyameti yuhzihim ve yekulu eyne surekaiyellezine kuntum tusakkune fihim, kalellezine utul ilme innel hızyel yevme ves sue alel kafirin(kafirine)
Ellezine teteveffahumul melaiketu zalimi enfusihim fe elkavus seleme ma kunna na’melu min su’(suin), bela innallahe alimun bima kuntum ta’melun(ta’melune)
Fedhulu ebvabe cehenneme halidine fiha fe lebi’se mesvel mutekebbirin(mutekebbirine)
Ve kile lillezinettekav ma za enzele rabbukum, kalu hayra(hayren), lillezine ahsenu fi hazihid dunya haseneh(haseneten), ve le darul ahıreti hayr(hayrun), ve le ni’me darul muttekin(muttekine)
Cennatu adnin yedhuluneha tecri min tahtihel enharu lehum fiha ma yesaun(yesaune), kezalike yeczillahul muttekin(muttekine)
Ellezine teteveffahumul melaiketu tayyibine yekulune selamun aleykumudhulul cennete bima kuntum ta’melun(ta’melune)
Hel yanzurune illa en te’tiyehumul melaiketu ev ye’tiye emru rabbik(rabbike), kezalike fe alellezine min kablihim, ve ma zalemehumullahu ve lakin kanu enfusehum yazlimun(yazlimune)
Fe esabehum seyyiatu ma amilu ve haka bihim ma kanu bihi yestehziun(yestehziune)
